name: h3
description: The 2026 Rawlings Icon BBCOR Baseball Bat is a standout choice for high school and college players seeking a balanced swing feel and optimal performance. This bat is BBCOR .50 certified and features a 2-piece composite design with a 2 5/8 inch barrel diameter, making it perfect for both contact and power hitters. Its striking teal colorway is complemented by In/Tense Carbon Composite technology, which enhances barrel performance and trampoline effect. With Zero Loss Energy Technology, players will experience reduced drag and minimized hand vibration, while the Tuned Balanced Performance feature adjusts seamlessly to each batter's swing. Additionally, the RevGrip provides superior tack and cushioning for a comfortable grip. Warranty chevron-down chevron-down chevron-down Warranty A Full Manufacturer's Warranty of 365 Days is included. If a warranty issue arises, our Bat Experts are happy to assist you in reaching the manufacturer to get a fast replacement! Begin Your Claim Here: Start My Warranty Claim
